Here are 8 cool things you didn't know you can do with Solid Explorer. The best ES File Explorer alternative out there. 


Download Solid Explore - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=pl.solidexplorer2&hl=en

1. Dual Panel
2. Access your Android Files from other devices
3. Access your Computer Files from Android device
4. Hide Media from Gallery
5. Password protect a folder on Android 
6. Extract Content of Any App
7. Edit Android Host File
8. Install any app as a system app
